Name: Isometric Nonogram
About the game: Isometric version of classic nonograms. 3 visible sides of the cube are not independent. They are making common rows and columns with each other and it brings a fresh new feeling to the famous game. Each puzzle is generated randomly and you can set the difficulty level and size of the cube. Difficulty just depends on how many black and how many empty cells are on the cube.
